news.title: Defence review to send 'message to Moscow', says Healey
news.summary: At least six new factories will be built and up to 7,000 UK-built long-range weapons will be procured.

news.title: Briton accused of plot to export US military tech
news.summary: John Miller and Chinese man Cui Guanghai are in custody in Serbia facing a US extradition request.

news.title: Romesh Ranganathan opens up about mental health struggle
news.summary: The comedian says he hopes to destigmatise mental health issues by being open about his own experiences.

news.title: People say cola and fries are helping their migraines - but there's a twist
news.summary: Migraines are one of the most complex neurological disorders. What is the science behind the latest hack?

news.title: 'Our love is frowned upon, but we push through': Navigating religion and relationships
news.summary: Five people spoke to BBC News for the documentary Sex After about how rules affect their lives.

news.title: Bakery tourism: 'There's no limit on how far we'll travel for pastries'
news.summary: Jessica Morgan-Helliwell admits she would rather meet her mates for a pastry than a pint.

news.title: Playing through the pain and burnout fears - is there too much tennis?
news.summary: As Alex de Minaur and Casper Ruud speak about burnout, is there too much tennis in the calendar - and what are the solutions?

news.title: How FA's new transgender policy is affecting players
news.summary: The FA's ban on transgender women playing women's football in England comes into effect on Sunday - BBC Sport hears a range of views.

news.title: IFS says tough public spending choices unavoidable
news.summary: With the NHS and defence getting more funding, cuts to other areas are inevitable, the influential think tank says.

news.title: Two Scottish men shot dead at bar in Spain
news.summary: A gunman is reported to have opened fire at an Irish bar in Fuengirola on Saturday evening.
